live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
64638.summary: Some customers in the Hart Highlands area of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64638.title: July 25 - Prince George (Hart Highlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

64639.summary: Some customers in the Lower Townsite, Beacon Hill, Gregoire, Patio Homes East, Mackenzie Industrial Park , River View Heights, Saprae Creek, & Gregoire Lake areas of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64639.title: July 25 - Fort McMurray (Lower Townsite, Beacon Hill, Gregoire, Patio Homes East, Mackenzie Industrial Park , River View Heights, Saprae Creek, & Gregoire Lake) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
